identity.name: AgroLink
identity.primary_audience: Agri-business professionals, Credit Analysts, System Admins

headings.usage: Use for all page titles, widget headers, and modal titles. Tracking tight.

body.usage: Use for data tables, form inputs, and general text. Tracking normal.

mono.usage: Use for credit protocol numbers, transaction IDs, and financial data.

rules: Use h-full on all cards to ensure equal height alignment.

cards.style: Flat background, 1px subtle border (border-border), no shadow or very subtle shadow-sm.

timeline.style: Vertical step progress. Connected lines. Active step highlighted with Primary color. Completed steps with Check icon.
timeline.orientation: Vertical for details view, Horizontal for summary view.

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle grain overlay on the sidebar or dark mode background to reduce digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-md bg-background/80 for sticky headers and modal overlays.
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 'Tracing Beam' effect for active project cards or high-priority alerts.

images.description: Drone view of green agricultural field. Use for login page background or dashboard header overlay.
Farmer using tablet with AI technology. Use for 'Digital Transformation' or 'Mobile Access' feature section.
Combine harvester at sunset. Use for 'Project Completion' or 'Harvest' metaphors.

assets.icons: Use Lucide React (default). For specialized agri-icons, use Phosphor Icons if needed.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for main backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle textures.
Ensure all text has a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1 against its background.
All interactive elements MUST have a `data-testid` attribute (kebab-case).
Use `shadcn` components for all interactive UI elements (forms, dialogs, dropdowns).
Do not center-align main dashboard content; use left alignment for readability.
Add micro-interactions (hover, focus, active) to all clickable elements.
Respect the 'Bento' grid layout; avoid equal-width columns everywhere.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building the AgroLink CRM. Start by setting up the layout shell (Sidebar + Header). Then build the Dashboard with the Bento grid. Use the provided images for the Login page and empty states. Ensure the Dark/Light mode toggle works using the existing Tailwind config. Focus on the 'Project Timeline' component as it is the core feature.
